plot_lattice[source]

plot_lattice(posx_, posy_, color_, title_)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

{% raw %}

Rydberg_v3v4[source]

Rydberg_v3v4(v1_, v2_)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This function computes the value of $V_3$ and $V_4$ for fixed $V_1$ and $V_2$, following the Rydberg dressing potential.
